workflow.title: Full Resolution Rasterization
workflow.abstract: This service allows to generate full-res RGB (Optical) and single-channel (SAR) Geotiff images from multi-sensors EO data products. In case of Sentinel-1 data the result is 20mx20m in order to increase the number of looks and reduce image size.

source.title: Data reference
source.abstract: Define the data product reference to be browsed in full resolution
